lead_paragraph: Michelle Wie will make her first appearance in a full Ladies European Tour field at this week’s German Open. Wie, 18, was given a sponsor’s invitation to play in the event, which begins Thursday. A sore wrist in March and studies at Stanford have limited Wie to just two tournaments on the L.P.G.A. Tour this year. Wie, ranked 172nd, shot a practice round with Amy Yang, 18, of South Korea, the European Tour’s leading money earner.
